hadith.chapter: The Book of Prayer (Friday) - كتاب الجمعة
hadith.arabic-text: حدثنا زهير بن حرب، حدثنا إسماعيل بن إبراهيم، حدثنا أيوب، عن محمد، عن أبي هريرة، قال قال أبو القاسم صلى الله عليه وسلم ‏"‏ إن في الجمعة لساعة لا يوافقها
hadith.english-text: Abu Huraira reported Abu'l-Qasim (the kunya of the Holy Prophet) (may peace be upon him) as saying: There is a time on Friday at which no Muslim would stand and pray and beg Allah for what Is good but He would give it to him; and he pointed with his hand that (this time) is short and narrow.
